verses.content: Chun, Kis naupa Saula leia an khâr khum tlat laia Ziklaga David kuoma hunghai chu hienghai hi an nih: anni chu mi thil- thawtheihai laia tiemsa, indonaa ama ṭhangpuituhai chu an nih.
Thalngul leh an inthuom a; thal- ngula thal kâp ding le dêngvira lung dêng dingin vawitieng le changtieng an hmang thei ve ve a; Benjamin thla Saula unauhai an nih.
A hotu tak chu Ahiezer a na, chun, Gibeath mi Semaa naupa Joas; chun, Jeziel le Pelet, Azmaveth naupasalhai le chun; chun, Anathoth mi Jehu le Beraka leh;
sâwmthum chunga le sâwm- thumhai laia mi thilthawtheitak Gibeon mi Ismaia leh; chun, Gederath mi Jozabad le, Johanan le Jahaziel le, Jeremia leh;
chun, Haruph mi Sephatia, Semaria, Bealia, Jerimoth le Eluzai;
Kora mihai Jasobeam, Joezer, Azarel, Issia le Elkana.
Gedora Jeroham naupasalhai Zebadia le Joela leh.

Chun, Gad mihai chu thlalêra kula khan David kuomah an um hran bîk a, mi hrât khawkhêng, indo dinga inchûkthiem mi phaw le thal chawi thiem mi; an hmaihai chu sakeibak- nei hmai ang el le, an hrâtzie chu tlâng chunga sakhi anga hrât an nih;
a pakhatna chu Ezer, a pahnina chu Obadia, a pathumna chu Eliab,
a palina chu Mismanna, a pangana chu Jeremia;
a parukna chu Attai, a pasarina chu Eliel;
a parietna chu Johanan, a pakuona chu Elzabad;
a sâwmna chu Jeremia, sâwm le pakhatna chu Makbanai a nih.
Hieng Gad naupasalhai hi sipaihai hotuhai an na; anni laia a châutak chu mi za khat tluk a na, a hrâttak chu mi sâng khat tluk a nih.
Thla khatnaa Jordan vadung a kuong a liem pûr lai khawma kântu- hai chu an nih; chuongchun, chu varuoma a saktieng le a thlangtienga umhai po po chu an intlânsiettir a.
Chun, chutaka chun Juda le Benjamin thlahai chu David kuomah kula chun an hung a.

David chu anni tuok dingin a va suok a, anni chu a dawn a, an kuomah, “Kei mi ṭhangpui dinga muongumtaka hung in ni chun, ka lungril chu nangnia kawp tlat a ta, amiruokchu, ka kutin pawi a tâwk nawh ti hre zinga; ka hmêlmahai kuoma mîn mantir dinga hung in ni ruok chun, ei thlatuhai Pathien chun, chu chu en sienla cheu, kâwk raw se cheu,” a ta.

Chun, sâwmthum laia a hotu tak Amasai kuoma chun thlarau chu a hung tlung tah a, ama chun, “David, nangma ta kan na, nangma tienga ṭhang kan nih, nang Jesai naupa; inremna, nanga kuoma chun inremna um sienla, nangma ṭhangpuituhai che kuoma khawm inremna chu um raw se; i Pathien chun a ṭhangpui si cheh a,” a ta. Chun, David chun anni chu a lâwmlût tah a, sipai pâwl hotuhaiah a siem tâwl tah a.

Saula do dinga Philistin mi- hai le an hung lai khan, Manasse mi ṭhenkhat chu David tienga chun an pakai a; nisienlakhawm, anni chun an lo ṭhangpui nawh a; Philistin mi hotuhai chun, rem- ruotin ama chu an tir hmang a, “A hotupa Saula kuoma hin pakai a ta, ei lu inhmang rawi ei tih,” an ti sih a.
Chun, ama chu Ziklaga a fe chun Manasse mi Adna, Jozabad, Jediael, Mikael, Jozabad, Elihu le Zillethai hai hi, sipai sâng pâwl hotuhai, Manasse hnama mi, ama tieng an ṭhang a.
Anni chun David chu inru pâwl laia inthawkin an ṭhangpui a; anni chu mi hrât khawkhêng ruok an ni sih a, sipai pâwl lai khawm hotu an ni bawk a.
Chuongchun, a ni têlin sipai pâwl lientak, Pathien sipaihai ang hiel an ni hmakhat chun David kuom- a chun an hung pei a.
Hienghi LALPA thu ang pei a, Saula ram chu ama kuoma pe dinga Hebrona David kuoma, indo dinga inthuom saa hunghai hotuhai nizât chu a nih.
Juda thlahai, phaw le fei chawia indo dinga inthuom chu sâng ruk le za riet an nih.
Simeon thlahai, indonaa mi hrât khawkhênghai chu sâng sari le za khat,
Levi thlahai chu sâng li le za ruk.
Chun, Jehoiada chu Aron sûng- kuoa chun a ṭhuoitu a na, ama le chun sâng thum le za sari an um a;
chun, Zadok tlangvâl hrât khawkhêng, a pa pahnamah hotu sâwmhni le pahni.
Saula unauhai, Benjamin thlahai chu sâng thum: anni a tam lem tak chu Saula tienga ṭhang an nih.
Chun, Ephraim thlahai, an pahnama mi hming inthang le mi hrât khawkhênghai chu sîng hni le za riet.
Manasse hnam zâtvea chun sîng le sâng riet; anni chu David chu lala siem dinga fe dinga an hming pe ṭhalhai chu an nih.
Issakar thlahai, Israel chun ieng am a thaw ding a na ti hre dinga thil umziehai hrethiem mihai; an hotuhai chu za hni an ni a; an unauhai po po chu an thu hnuoia chun an um a nih.

Zebulun thla, sipai ni dinga fe suok thei ṭhieu, indona khawm a pâwl pâwla ṭhangkhaw thiem mi, indo hriem tinrêng hmang thiem mi chu sîng nga; chuonghai chu indona chu pâwl tlar indiktaka rem thiem, lungril thuo hni nei ni lo an nih.
Naphtali thlaa mi hotu sâng khat le, phaw le fei chawi mi sîng thum le sâng sari an nih.
Dan mihai indona chu a pâwl pâwla ṭhangkhaw thiem mihai chu sîng hni le sâng riet le za ruk.
Aser thlaa mi, sipai pâwla fe suok thei ṭhieu, indona chu a pâwl pâwla ṭhangkhaw thiem mi sîng li.
Jordan râl tienga, Reuben mihai, Gad mihai le Manasse hnam zâtvehai, indona hriem tinrêng hmang thiem mihai chu nuoi khat le sîng hni.

Hieng mi po po, indo thiem mi, indona chu a pâwl pâwla rêl fel thiem mihai hi, Israel po po chunga David chu lala siem dingin Hebrona chun lungril hmunkhat putin an hung tâwl a; chun, Israel laia mi dang hrim hrim khawm chu David chu lala siem ding thua chun lungril hmunkhatin an um a.
Chun, chutaka chun David rawi chun ni thum sûng chu faa dâwnin an um a; an unauhai chun an ta dingin an lo buotsaipêk sih a.

Chu chau naw khawm chu, anni hnai deuhai; Issakar le Zebulun le Naphtali ram chen khawma, sabeng- tung dâmin, sanghâwngsei dâmin, sabengtung lienchi dâmin, bâwng- chal dâmin, bei dâm, fâk ding tinrêng dâm, theichang bei dâm, grêp ra ṭâwl bâwr dâm, uoin dâm, hriek dâm, bâwngchal le berâm chen khawm tamtak an hung chawi a; Israel rama chun nasataka hlimna a um a.
